name: Switchboard Copper
description:
A series of more and more interesting crimes comes through the station as you play a switchboard policeman in the fictional world of Antiford.

External Links

Created for the Global Game Jam 2018 https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/switchboard-copper

Source available here: https://github.com/lunarcloud/visual-novel-GGJ-2018/

Uses the setting and themes from the fictional universe of the Citizens of Antiford, found at https://citizensofantiford.com/

Credits

Software Development: Samuel J Sarette

Writing: Justin Thibault, Samuel J Sarette

Art: KD Doyle

Music: (royalty free sources)

  •     Hall of the Mountain King - Kevin MacLeod
  •     Airship Fury - Jahzzar
